name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience crafting robust applications, particularly in compliance-driven environments. Proficient in **.NET Core**, **C#**, and **Angular**, with additional expertise in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **jQuery**. Demonstrated ability in applying **Clean Architecture** and implementing **Microservices** and **RESTful APIs** for scalable solutions.
Skilled in frontend technologies, including **TailwindCSS**, ensuring responsive and efficient user interfaces. Committed to rigorous **Unit Testing** practices to enhance software reliability and maintainability.
Experienced in building high-performance applications across healthcare and finance sectors, leveraging AI/ML to enhance predictive analytics and real-time operations. Demonstrated success in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside foundational knowledge in CI/CD pipelines.
